title: #489 Poop with Robert Kelly
itunes:title: Poop with Robert Kelly
description:
Robert Kelly's got a new special out now! Kill Box is available on LouisCK.com for purchase. But if you want to listen to us talk about poop for an hour first, I highly recommend it. We've got some call in's from a few special guests as well.

 

For more Ari: 

Get tickets to see Ari on the road: https://www.arishaffir.com/tour

Merch & more: https://www.arishaffir.com/ 

 

For more Bobby:

Watch Bobby’s new special Kill Box available now: https://louisck.com/products/robert-kelly-kill-box 

For more: https://robertkellylive.com/ 

 

The Music:

Salt n Pepa - Push It

Kate Nash - Shit Song

Pharoah Monch - The Next Shit

Pink Floyd-Wish You Were Here

Thank you to our sponsors! 3chi.com use code "Ari" for 5% off and BetterHelp.com/Ari for 10% off your first month!
